description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=1/3. Welcome traveller, to our tavern "The Laughing Elf"! Sit back and relax with this popular strategic card game. Play as either Human, Undead, Elf or Orc. Build a deck from 120 unique cards. Compete with friends and foes alike, in both local and online matches, or practice your skills against the Ai.
description.short: Welcome traveller, to our tavern "The Laughing Elf"! Sit back and relax with this popular strategic card game. Play as either Human, Undead, Elf or Orc. Build a deck from 120 unique cards. Compete with friends and foes alike, in both local and online matches, or practice your skills against the Ai.
